name.name: Beast Ball
name.effect: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.

name.name: Cherish Ball
name.effect: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

name.name: Dive Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon that live underwater.

name.name: Dream Ball
name.effect: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

name.name: Dusk Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

name.name: Fast Ball
name.effect: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon which are quick to run away.

name.name: Friend Ball
name.effect: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.

name.name: Great Ball
name.effect: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

name.name: Heal Ball
name.effect: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates any status problem.

name.name: Heavy Ball
name.effect: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.

name.name: Level Ball
name.effect: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.

name.name: Love Ball
name.effect: Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

name.name: Lure Ball
name.effect: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

name.name: Luxury Ball
name.effect: A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly.

name.name: Master Ball
name.effect: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

name.name: Moon Ball
name.effect: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

name.name: Nest Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokémon in the wild.

name.name: Net Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Water- and Bug-type Pokémon.

name.name: Park Ball
name.effect: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

name.name: Poké Ball
name.effect: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It is thrown like a ball at the target. It is designed as a capsule system.

name.name: Premier Ball
name.effect: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort.

name.name: Quick Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different Poké Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.

name.name: Repeat Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon species that were previously caught.

name.name: Safari Ball
name.effect: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a camouflage pattern.

name.name: Sport Ball
name.effect: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

name.name: Timer Ball
name.effect: A somewhat different BALL that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle.

name.name: Ultra Ball
name.effect: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.
